Nearly 10 years after a "doomsday" seed vault opened on an Arctic island, some 50,000 new samples from seed collections around the world have been deposited in the world's largest repository built to safeguard against wars or natural disasters wiping out global food crops.

Turkey says 'No' to saying 'No', ahead of its referendum. In a speech this month, Mr Erdogan said those voting "no" would be "siding with the coup-plotters". Alluding to the Kurdish militant group the PKK, he added: "The separatist terrorist organisation says 'no'. Those siding with them say 'no'."
